string-array.name: tipps
string-array.item: Go to Settings->Autocompletion \nto download some data for your area.

Hi, this is Scotty. 
If there is anything bugging or bothering please don't hesitate to contact me. 
At any time I'll be glad to assist, help and guide you through :-) 
Have a pleasant ride and enjoy the beam!
Tap on [destination] \nto set where you want to beam to.
Tap on [start] \nto set where you\'re currently at.
That\'s it :-)
There is really nothing more to it right now.
This button has no function other than repeating these tipps.
Go set your [start] and [destination] and then beam.
Have you tried switching it off and on again?
So why are you still asking me?
You already know what to do.
Ok one last time: Tap on [start] and/or [destination].
I am really tired of explaining this over and over again!
If you don\'t like the user interface Please design a better one!
Fork one of the git repos or mail to scotty@teleportr.org what you\'d like to have...
I\'m through. This has been the last tipp.
This is the absolute final last tipp!
I\'ve nothing more to tell you.
There are no more tipps here!
Stop pressing this button!
please stop.
"%$@ยงX/ยง!
foooo!
bar?
Ok you get one more tipp if you promise to stop then!?
You just wasted 1.5 minutes of your valuable time pressing this stupid buttopn agaiun and again. You could be teleporting already. Think about it!
